name: Eurydice
description:
Venture to the Underworld as Orpheus to save his beloved Eurydice. String together notes to form melodies to sooth enemy foes or buff yourself.

Developed by

Ben Bauer - Bbauer  https://bbauer.itch.io/

Peter Bedrick - peterbdude https://itch.io/profile/peter-bedrick

Cody Cook  - codycook33 https://itch.io/profile/codycook33
